name: Space Ruin
description:
An entry for the Ludum Dare 51-JAM .

 Stay alive for as long as possible, the ruins contain mysterious aliens and side effects. Every 10 seconds, an effect will occur and the only way to stay immune from them is by stepping on the light blue Sanctuary Panels. Though not every effect is bad... just don't feel too comfy when you're constantly getting good effects as it may just be the thing to end your run.

Note:

After Ludum Dare 51 is over I will look into turning this into a dungeon shooter, which was supposed to be the original intention of this game until an issue had surfaced.
